name: Ahmed Tikiwa
bio: Ahmed Tikiwa is currently a Senior Software Engineer in Android at Luno and has been a software engineer since 2010 having started with PHP and later focused primarily in Android development. He is based in Cape Town, South Africa. He is also a co-organizer for GDG Cape Town. Ahmed is passionate about the developer community where he engages in speaking at tech conferences, meetups, writing Medium blogs, developer mentoring and open-source contributions.
